system.effect: Protects the ship during warp travel. +10 to Navigation Tests to pilot the ship through the warp. But -20 to results of rolls made on Warp Travel Encounter Table. Gellar field is known to flicker during prolonged use.

description.value: Protects the ship during warp travel. +10 to Navigation Tests to pilot the ship through the warp. But -20 to results of rolls made on Warp Travel Encounter Table. Gellar field is known to flicker during prolonged use.
